GSD.description:
ntfs: check overflow when iterating ATTR_RECORDs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.10 by commit 785b2af9654b8beac55644e36da0085c5d776361. For more details please see the references link.
